text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 4.4.19, Audit Information Management System (AIMS) – Validity and Consistency, Manual Refunds.
The material in this IRM is not part of the validity and consistency of AIMS and is being obsoleted. Changes are reﬂected in the table below.
The content of this IRM has been moved as indicated in this crosswalk:

IRM 4.4.19 Current IRM IRM 4.4.19.1 IRM 21.4.4.2, What Is a Manual Refund? IRM 4.4.19.2 IR IRM 4.4.4.4.3, Non-Master File Research IRM 21.4.4.3, Why Would a Manual Refund Be Needed? IRM 4.4.19.3 IRM 21.4.4.4, What Research Is Required?, IRM 21.4.4.4.1, Refund Statute Expiration Date, IRM 21.4.4.4.2, Outstanding Balances/Duplicate Refund IRM 4.4.19.4 IRM 21.4.4.4.3, Non-Master File Research IRM 4.4.19.5 IRM 21.4.4.4.4, Bureau of the Fiscal Service (BFS) Non-Tax Debts IRM 4.4.19.6 IRM 21.4.6.5.11.1, Offset Bypass Refund (OBR) IRM 4.4.19.7 IRM 21.4.4.4.5, Approval from Other Functions IRM 4.4.19.8 IRM 21.4.4.5, Preparation of Manual Refund Forms IRM 4.4.19.8.1 IRM 21.4.4.5.2, Preparation of the Form 3753, Manual Refund Voucher, Exhibit 21.4.4-2, Manual Refund Checklists

IRM 4.4.19 Current IRM IRM 4.4.19.8.2 IRM 21.4.4.5.1, Preparation of Form 5792, IDRS Generated Refund, Exhibit 21.4.4-2, Manual Refund Checklists IRM 4.4.19.9 IRM 21.4.4.5 (2) (3),Preparation of Manual Refund Forms IRM 4.4.19.10 IRM 4.4.12.5.2 Examined Closing, Surveyed Claims & Partial Assessment IRM 4.4.19.11 Exhibit 21.4.4-3, Accounting Function - Manual Refund Team Contact Information IRM 4.4.19.12 IRM 21.4.4.6.1, Monitoring Manual Refunds IRM 4.4.19.12.1 IRM 21.4.1.5.10, Refund Intercept Command Code NOREF with Deﬁner P Exhibit 4.4.19-1 IRM 21.4.4.5.2, Preparation of the Form 3753, Manual Refund Voucher, Exhibit 21.4.4-2, Manual Refund Checklists Exhibit 4.4.19-2 IRM 21.4.4.5.1, Preparation of Form 5792, IDRS Generated Refund, Exhibit 21.4.4-2, Manual Refund Checklists
IRM 4.4.19, dated 08-18-2016, is obsolete as of the IRM effective date.
Large Business and International (LB&I), Small Business/Self Employed (SB/SE), Wage and Investment (W&I), Tax Exempt and Government Entities (TEGE) and Appeals employees who issue manual refunds.
